attributes.action: Make a deterent for carrying Knifes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring back a (Deterent) for carrying knifes, Namely the BIRCH anyone carrying a Knife make the sentance a set number of strokes of the  Birch this might just deter these thugs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
